name: Yamato
effect:
[Double Attack] (This card deals 2 damage.)
[Activate: Main] [Once Per Turn] If your opponent has 3 or less Life cards, give up to 2 rested DON!! cards to 1 of your Characters.

name: Inuarashi
effect: [DON!! x2] [When Attacking] You may trash 1 card from your hand: K.O. up to 1 of your opponent's Characters with a cost equal to or less than the number of your opponent's Life cards.
trigger: [Trigger] If your opponent has 3 or less Life cards, play this card.

name: Kawamatsu
effect: [When Attacking] You may trash 2 cards from your hand: Add up to 1 of your Characters with 0 power to the top or bottom of the owner's Life cards face-up.
trigger: [Trigger] If your opponent has 3 or less Life cards, play this card.

name: Kikunojo
effect: [On K.O.] If your opponent has 3 or less Life cards, add up to 1 card from the top of your deck to the top of your Life cards.
trigger: [Trigger] If your opponent has 3 or less Life cards, play this card.

name: Denjiro
effect: [DON!! x2] If your opponent has 3 or less Life cards, this Character cannot be K.O.'d by effects.
trigger: [Trigger] If your opponent has 3 or less Life cards, play this card.

name: Nekomamushi
effect: [DON!! x2] This Character can also attack your opponent's active Characters.
trigger: [Trigger] If your opponent has 3 or less Life cards, play this card.

name: Raizo
effect: [When Attacking] You may trash 1 card from your hand: Rest up to 1 of your opponent's DON!! cards.
trigger: [Trigger] If your opponent has 3 or less Life cards, play this card.

name: Blaze Slice
effect: [Main]/[Counter] Up to 1 of your Leader or Character cards gains +1000 power during this turn. Then, if your opponent has 2 or less Life cards, rest up to 1 of your opponent's Characters with a cost of 4 or less.
trigger: [Trigger] Rest up to 1 of your opponent's Characters with a cost of 4 or less.

name: Portgas.D.Ace
effect: [On Play] If you have 2 or more rested Characters, rest up to 1 of your opponent's Characters with a cost of 5 or less.

name: Yamato
effect:
[Rush] (This card can attack on the turn in which it is played.)
[On Play] Look at all your Life cards; place 1 at the top of your deck and place the rest back in your Life area in any order.

name: Ashura Doji
effect: [On Play] If your Leader has the {Land of Wano} type and your opponent has 3 or more Life cards, K.O. up to 1 of your opponent's Characters with a base cost of 5 or less.

name: Izo
effect:
[DON!! x2] This Character gains [Blocker].
[On Play] Your {Land of Wano} type Leader gains [Banish] during this turn.

name: Kin'emon
trigger: [Trigger] If your Leader has the {Land of Wano} type and your opponent has 3 or less Life cards, play this card.

name: Kouzuki Momonosuke
effect:
[Your Turn] If you have 2 or less Life cards, your Leader gains +1000 power.
[Activate: Main] [Once Per Turn] You may return 2 total of your currently given DON!! cards to your cost area rested: This Character gains [Rush] and +1000 power during this turn.
(This card can attack on the turn in which it is played.)

name: Yamato
effect:
[DON!! x2] [Your Turn] This Character gains +3000 power.
[On Play] Look at 5 cards from the top of your deck; reveal up to 1 {Land of Wano} type card with a cost of 2 or more and add it to your hand. Then, place the rest at the bottom of your deck in any order.
